title: BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION 4 bedroom, Just in time for 9/1
posting_body: We have multiple units with 2, 3, 4 bedrooms available in this building.
Unit 2: $ 4,700 - 3d video tour coming soon - 3 BED/ 1 BATH
Unit 3: $4,500 - 3d video tour coming soon - 3 BED/ 1.5 BATH
Unit 6: $3,600 - 3d video tour coming soon - 2 BED/ 1 BATH
BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit ready just in time for September 1st.
The unit features hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, and central heat/ac.
Located within walking distance to 3 MBTA Green lines (B,C, D), a Whole Foods grocery store, as well as many shops and restaurants, Cleveland Circle, Coolidge Corner, and Washington Square.
Just a half-mile from the Chestnut Hill Reservoir.
Cats are OK for an additional $75 per month.
Dogs are considered on a case-by-case basis for an additional $150 per month.
TENANTS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR WATER AND SEWER PAYMENTS.
